text: Ngemela sibone ubuso bakho bubheke eZulwini, sizokwenza ukuba uphendukele kule Qibla ozoyithanda. Ngakho-ke phendula ubuso bakho bubheke eMasjidil Haraam noma yikuphi lapho (abakholwayo) bekhona phendulani ubuso benu bubheke khona (uma nithandaza) ngempela labo abanikwe incwadi, ukuze bazi ukuthi iyiqiniso elivela eNkosini yabo. Futhi akusikona ukuthi uMvelinqangi akakunakile lokho abakwenzayo
